body:
One issue with third party tools is that they tend not to work in the context of Firefox chrome code (internal browser code), so we probably can't use something off the shelf for the add-on.

The admin, on the other hand, is just normal webcode. We already have access to Sentry, and we can hook that up to the admin. That should be a different issue though.
